title: Landscape in stamps
creator_credit: New Zealand National Film Unit, Tom Williamson and Michael Reeves
brief_description: Poetry, music and the detail of postage stamps are combined to produce an essentially impressionistic view of New Zealand’s social and physical landscape. A new direction of stamp concept.
creator_credit_for_label: New Zealand National Film Unit, Tom Williamson and Michael Reeves
description: Poetry, music and the detail of postage stamps are combined to produce an essentially impressionistic view of New Zealand’s social and physical landscape. A new direction of stamp concept.
